text: Na'ankure nagri'ene vahe'ni'anena ko tahe'za akafri kafro nehu'za tazeri havizama nehu'za tahe vagamaresageta frisuna vahe zamazampi zagore tatre'naze. Hagi kazokzo eri'za vahe'ma tavarenaku'ma hiresina, nagra amanahu kea hu'na kna onkamusine. Hianagi nagri'ene naga'ni'anena mika'a tahe vagareke hu'naze.
